name: Valerie Ding
body:
### November 12, 2016
Test blog post.

### Remote for Android
I wrote the full-stack implementation for this music mobile application in one hour (Android Java/XML). This was ideated in collaboration with novelist Muse Lee in August 2016. After temporarily authorizing unknown sources on your Android device (Settings > Security > Unknown Sources), you can access the secure Remote release page on GitHub [here](https://github.com/dingv/dingv.github.io/releases/tag/v1.0).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
